entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kindersley Airport 04:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
